days.title: Self-Awareness
days.prompt: When do you notice your ego most active? Reflect on a recent situation where your ego might have influenced your behavior or decisions.

days.title: Humility Practice
days.prompt: Write about something you don't know or aren't good at. How does it feel to acknowledge this? What can you learn from this admission?

days.title: Perspective Shift
days.prompt: Think of a recent conflict or disagreement. Try to see it entirely from the other person's perspective. What might you have missed?
